snippet.title: Batman: Arkham Knight – Crime Fighter Challenge Pack #5
snippet.description:
Batman: Arkham Knight – Crime Fighter Challenge Pack #5

Batman: Arkham Knight – Season Pass DLC Videos Playlist:
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL7N-XnsRG9lw96wNsxCJ7IWDaGr477D2p

***************************************************

Firesale (0:03) - Ranked Challenge

Predator Stars:
● Save the optically camouflaged enemy until last.
● Do not use the grapnel gun.
● Destroy the sentry guns without being seen.

Time Taken: 2:09.46

Character Skin: Original Arkham Nightwing
-

Duet (3:12) - Ranked Challenge

Combat Stars:
● 03 - Score 50,000 points.
● 02 - Score 20,000 points.
● 01 - Score 10,000 points.

Total Score: 115,585

Characters Skins: 2008 Movie Batman / Original Tim Drake Robin

-

Graveyard Shift (8:29) - Ranked Challenge

Combat Stars:
● 03 - Defend all three zones for longer than 3:00.
● 02 - Defend all three zones for longer than 2:00.
● 01 - Defend all three zones for longer than 1:00.

Time Achieved: 3:47.81

Vehicle Skin: Rocksteady Themed Batmobile

-

Hand of God (12:48) - Ranked Challenge

Combat Stars:
● 03 - Score 50,000 points.
● 02 - Score 30,000 points.
● 01 - Score 10,500 points.

Total Score: 116,970

Character Skin: Azrael

-

Flawless (19:36) - Ranked Challenge

Combat Stars:
● 03 - Score 50,000 points.
● 02 - Score 30,000 points.
● 01 - Score 10,500 points.

Total Score: 364,035

Character Skin: V8.05 Batman

-

Psychiatricks (30:15) - Ranked Challenge

Predator Stars:
● Jack-in-the-Box takedown a medic.
● Take no damage.
● Cartwheel through a weak wall.

Time Taken: 0:35.77

Character Skin: Classic Harley Quinn

***************************************************

Game available on: PlayStation 4, Xbox One & PC
Video recorded on: Playstation 4

PSN: TheArkhamChannel

***************************************************

This is a channel mainly focused on providing the Arkham fans with all the latest news, official trailers, and gameplay videos about the Arkham games. The channel is not affiliated with Rocksteady Studios or WB Games.

Subscribe here:
http://goo.gl/vx4waB
